result.eng: I knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ga: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.orig: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.html: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḟios agam go raiḃ idirḋealú éigin ann idir an dá rud aċ ní raiḃ mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.

result.eng: He knew his health was getting worse.
result.ga: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip air
result.orig: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip air
result.html: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip airHe knew his health was getting worse.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sé go raiḃ an tsláinte ag teip airHe knew his health was getting worse.

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ga: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.orig: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.html: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig mé féin dá ḃféadfainn an Eoraip a ḃaint amaċ go mbeaḋ liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
